title: The card game me and my brother made up

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
*Game On* — During the day, challenge another player. The next time they and the host are both present, the host will ping them in their private channel. Once they send a message, the host will, if or when they're both still online, the host will tell them they have 120000 seconds to complete the following challenge:
> - Beat you in a game of 2-deck Diamonds. Ask Rasen for how to play.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: *Prize!* — If a challenged player successfully completes your challenge, they may convert into any role that references diamonds or Igu.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Get a total of 64 diamonds across games
